  "Broker Comment" : "OUR REVIEW FOUND THE VARIABLE UNIVERSAL LIFE INSURANCE PRODUCT PURCHASED BY THE CLIENT MAY NOT HAVE BEEN THE MOST APPROPRIATE INVESTMENT OPTION FOR THE CLIENTS FINANCIAL CIRCUMSTANCES AND GOALS. WE HAVE FREE-LOOK CANCELLED THE INSURANCE POLICIES. *********** WE (MYSELF AND THE CLIENTS) WORKED THROUGH A DETAILED FINANCIAL PLANNING PROCESS, WHICH IDENTIFIED STRATEGIES AND RECOMMENDATIONS FOR THE ATTAINMENT OF THE CLIENT'S FINANCIAL GOALS; SUCH AS RETIREMENT, COLLEGE, PROTECTION (DISABLILITY AND LIFE INSURANCE), AND OTHER. I SHOWED THEM WITH FULL DISCLOSURE THE TERM ONLY, VERSUS TERM-PERMANENT STRATEGIES FOR PROTECTING THEIR INCOME. I PROVIDED ILLUSTRATIONS AND WE DISCUSSED IN LENGTH THE BENEFITS AND RISKS OF THE VUL. THEY ELECTED THE TERM AND VUL BLENDED COVERAGE."

  "Broker Comment" : "I AM VERY SURPRISED AT THIS COMPLAINT. [CUSTOMER] WAS A LONG TIME CLIENT, OF OVER 6 YEARS. A FINANCIAL PLAN WAS CREATED AND ANALYSIS PERFORMED. BASED ON THE DATA AND CURRENT EVENTS AT THAT TIME, THE RECOMMENDATION WAS DEEMED SUITABLE. BOTH MYSELF, AND MY DISTRICT MANAGER WERE PRESENT TO PROVIDE FULL DISCLOSURE AND CONFIRM THE CLIENT'S COMPREHENSION AND UNDERSTANDING OF ALL OF THE RECOMMENDATIONS. PRIOR TO LEAVING, I MET WITH [CUSTOMER] AND SPOUSE, LET THEM KNOW OF MY LEAVING, AND REMINDED THEM TO KEEP AN ONGOING EYE ON THE VUL, AS TO NOT LEAVE IT NEGLECTED, ALONG WITH OTHER CASUAL AND RAPPORT BASED TOPICS RELAVANT TO MY LEAVING OF FORMER B/D."
